page.title: 07Kearton's Plant Hire
page.content: R.D.Kearton and Sons have a plant hire business on the outskirts of Boldron Village.The machinery for hire includes 15 JCBs(earth movers),20 dump trucks(small carriers),10 tractors(all -purpose farm work),2 sprayers,5 hedge cutters,1 post hole borer,4 loaders,4 snow ploughs,5 large carriers(Shaune Poole),5 small trailers,1 low loader and 3 drotts(diggers with caterpillar tracks) This business distributes vehicles throughout England and Scotland.Much of the firm's own maintenance work is done by the 30 people (approximately) who are employed there. Keartons assist the local council during the winter by carrying out snow clearance work.In the summer hedge and verge cutting are undertaken. Many of these vehicles were involved in the alterations to the A66 road.
